title: GeoView Swiper Config Schema
description: Configuration schema for GeoView swiper package that enables layer comparison through a draggable swiper control.

orientation.description: Orientation of the swiper bar. Vertical creates a left-right swipe, horizontal creates a top-bottom swipe.

keyboardOffset.description: The offset value in pixels when swiper is moved using keyboard arrow keys (Ctrl + Arrow).

layers.description: Array of layer paths that will be affected by the swiper functionality.

items.description: Layer path identifier for a layer that should be clipped by the swiper.

version.description: The schema version used to validate the configuration file.
